greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n-th prime rotated one binary place to the left.
mathematica: f[n_] := FromDigits[ RotateLeft[ IntegerDigits[n, 2]], 2]; Table[ f[ Prime[i]], {i, 1, 60}]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 13 2003
